name: create-fullstack-monorepo
description: A fullstack TypeScript monorepo template with React frontend and Node.js backend

scripts.backend:dev: concurrently -n shared,backend -c cyan,green "pnpm --filter shared watch:index" "pnpm --filter backend dev"
scripts.frontend:dev: concurrently -n shared,frontend -c cyan,magenta "pnpm --filter shared watch:index" "pnpm --filter frontend dev"
